Submodules

favorite_service.favorite module

favorite_service.favorite.add_favorite(inventory_id)[source]

Add an item to the favorites list.

Parameters:

inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item to add as a favorite

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 400 if item is already a favorite, 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 404 if item or customer not found, 500 for server errors

Returns:

JSON representation of the added favorite

Return type:

flask.Response

favorite_service.favorite.add_wishlist(inventory_id)[source]

Add an item to the wishlist.

Parameters:

inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item to add to the wishlist

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 400 for bad requests, 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 404 if item or customer not found, 500 for server errors

Returns:

JSON representation of the added wishlist item

Return type:

flask.Response

favorite_service.favorite.delete_favorite(favorite_id)[source]

Delete a favorite item by ID.

Parameters:

favorite_id (int) – The ID of the favorite item to delete

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 404 if favorite not found, 500 for server errors

Returns:

Success message confirming deletion

Return type:

dict

favorite_service.favorite.delete_wishlist(wishlist_id)[source]

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 404 if wishlist not found, 500 for server errors

Returns:

Success message confirming deletion

Return type:

dict

favorite_service.favorite.get_favorite(favorite_id)[source]

Get a favorite item by ID.

Parameters:

favorite_id (int) – The ID of the favorite item to retrieve

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 404 if favorite not found, 500 for server errors

Returns:

JSON representation of the favorite item

Return type:

flask.Response

favorite_service.favorite.get_favorites()[source]

Get all favorite items for the authenticated customer.

Raises:

werkzeug.exceptions.HTTPException – 401 if unauthorized, 403 for invalid token, 500 for server errors

Returns:

JSON representation of the customer’s favorites

Return type:

flask.Response

favorite_service.models module

class favorite_service.models.Favorite(customer_id, inventory_id)[source]

Bases: Model

The Favorite object represents a customer’s favorite item.

Parameters:

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer who marked the item as a favorite

  • inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item marked as a favorite

Variables:

  • favorite_id (int) – The unique identifier for the favorite record

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer who marked the item as a favorite

  • inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item marked as a favorite

class favorite_service.models.Wishlist(customer_id, inventory_id)[source]

Bases: Model

The Wishlist object represents an item added to a customer’s wishlist.

Parameters:

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer who added the item to their wishlist

  • inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item added to the wishlist

Variables:

  • wishlist_id (int) – The unique identifier for the wishlist record

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer who added the item to their wishlist

  • inventory_id (int) – The ID of the inventory item added to the wishlist
